```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
require(ggplot2)
require(knitr)

```

```{r}
lp_data = read.csv('E:\\Karolina\\TI\\Semestr9\\ED\\Projekt\\lightpollution\\lp\\db.csv', sep=';', dec='.', header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
piotr_guzik_data <- lp_data[with(lp_data, grepl("Piotr Guzik", lp_data$name)),]
timemeasureastext <- as.Date(piotr_guzik_data [,7], format="%Y-%m-%d")
```

## Regression
```{r}
# lm(sqm~viirs_2015_1_mean, data=piotr_guzik_data)
```

## Including Plots

```{r plot, echo=TRUE}
ggplot(piotr_guzik_data, aes(x=timemeasureastext, y=sqm)) + xlab("Date") + ylab("SQM(L) [mag/arcsec^2]") + geom_point(color="blue")
ggplot(piotr_guzik_data, aes(x=sqm)) + xlab("SQM(L)") + geom_histogram(binwidth=0.1, col='blue')

## Radius - 1 km
ggplot(piotr_guzik_data, aes(x=viirs_2015_1_stddev)) + xlab("VIRS 2015 (1 km) Standard Devation [10^-9W/cm^2*sr]") + geom_histogram(binwidth=0.3, col='blue')
ggplot(piotr_guzik_data, aes(x=viirs_2015_1_mean)) + xlab ("VIRS 2015 (1 km) Mean  [10^-9W/cm^2*sr]") + geom_histogram(binwidth=0.3, col='blue')
ggplot(piotr_guzik_data, aes(x=viirs_2015_1_min)) + xlab("VIRS 2015 (1 km) Min  [10^-9W/cm^2*sr]") + geom_histogram(binwidth=0.3, col='blue')
ggplot(piotr_guzik_data, aes(x=viirs_2015_1_max)) + xlab("VIRS 2015 (1 km) Max  [10^-9W/cm^2*sr]") + geom_histogram(binwidth=0.3, col='blue')
```
